title: EMBROIDERED SHIRT DRESS WITH BELT
description: Cotton fabric. Midi design. Straight design. Embroidered fabric. Shirt Collar. Short sleeve. Belt loops. Belt buckle fastening. Wooden buckle. Front button closure. Available in Plus.

title: MIDI-DRESS WITH PUFFED HEM
description: Midi design. Straight design. Round neck. Sleeveless. Wide straps. Seam detail. Back zipper closure. Available in Plus. The orange color is exclusive online.

title: LONG FLORAL DRESS WITH SHORT SLEEVES
description: Long design. Straight design. Floral print. V-neck. Decorative bow. Short sleeve. Back zipper closure. Inner lining. Available in Plus.

title: COMBINED-FABRIC LONG DRESS
description: Cotton and modal mix. Combined design. Long design. Straight design. Round neck. Sleeveless. No closure. Available in Plus.

title: PAISLEY FLARED DRESS WITH BELT
description: Cotton fabric. Midi design. A-line design. Paisley print. V-neck. Short sleeve. Belt loops. Removable belt. Front button closure. Available Plus.

title: LINEN-BLEND MIDI-DRESS WITH BELT
description: Linen blend fabric. Midi design. A-line design. V-neck. Sleeveless. Wide straps. Belt loops. Removable belt. Front button closure. Available in Plus.

title: DRAPED SHIRT DRESS
description: Fluid fabric. Satin fabric. Shirt-style. Midi design. Shaved design. Striped print. Shirt Collar. Sleeveless. Button Closure at the Front. Available in Plus. Fitted design.

title: LONG CROPPED JUMPSUIT WITH BELT
description: Straight design. Boot cropped design. V-neck. Short sleeve. Belt loops. Removable belt. Two side pockets. Front pleat detail. Back zipper closure. Available in Plus.
